document.heading: LIMITATION ON BORROWING AND ESTABLISHMENT OF THE OPERATING CASH RESERVE ACT OF 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-360, the “Limitation on Borrowing and Establishment of the Operating Cash Reserve Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-914 which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 16, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-695 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-360 became effective on March 25, 2009.
